title: Sender Ramps release progression ramps for small, medium and large sends
content:
Sender Ramps has developed a new range of adjustable ramps for Mountain Biking, BMX, Scooters and Skating, where the transition can be switched from flat, to curved, to extra-curved, increasing the height of the take off. So, as your jumping skills progress, so does the ramp. As you improve, you can increase the height of

The post Sender Ramps release progression ramps for small, medium and large sends appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
